std_inline.citation:
'''Burial''': "eGGSA Burial, Cremation and Death Registers, Catherina Maria Vosloo"
Source: Forest Hill Cemetery, Port Elizabeth, Eastern Cape, burials register, 1955-2014, page . Repository: Forest Hill Cemetery, Port Elizabeth. Transcribed by Carol Beneke, from the original registers Note: The headstones in this Cemetery have been photographed and can be found in the eGGSA Gravestone collection
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBurials.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Surname: vosloo, First Name: maria in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Catherina Maria Vosloo burial (died on 9 Oct 1987 at age 85) on 13 Oct 1987. Born on 25 Feb 1902.

std_narrative.citation:
Catherina (age 85) died on 9 October 1987 and was buried on 13 October 1987. '''Burial''': "eGGSA Burial, Cremation and Death Registers, Catherina Maria Vosloo"
Source: Forest Hill Cemetery, Port Elizabeth, Eastern Cape, burials register, 1955-2014, page . Repository: Forest Hill Cemetery, Port Elizabeth. Transcribed by Carol Beneke, from the original registers Note: The headstones in this Cemetery have been photographed and can be found in the eGGSA Gravestone collection
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBurials.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Surname: vosloo, First Name: maria in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
